description: Try our easy to follow Chicken With Potatoes, Spinach & Blue Cheese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken With Potatoes, Spinach & Blue Cheese
name: Chicken With Potatoes, Spinach & Blue Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble the cheese into the pan and remove from the heat. Toss lightly to allow the cheese to soften slightly, then spoon on to warmed serving plates.
